text: Other things to do in Zurich 1. Check out Zoo Zurich One of Switzerland’s best-known zoos, home to over 300 animal species. The Masoala Rainforest Hall and Lewa Savannah enclosures make it a standout for all ages. 2. Go (window) shopping at Bahnhofstrasse Zurich’s main shopping street stretches from the main station to the lake. It's lined with boutiques, Swiss watch shops, department stores and international brands. 3. Party at Langstrasse Known for its edgy, multicultural vibe, Langstrasse comes alive at night with bars, clubs and late-night eateries. A great place if you're looking to experience Zurich’s party scene. 4. Indulge at Lindt Home of Chocolate Located in Kilchberg just outside the city, this modern chocolate museum has an impressive exhibition, a tasting zone and the world’s largest chocolate fountain. 5. Join a free walking tour A great way to get to know Zurich’s history, layout and quirks. Tours usually start from the main station and are tip-based. 6. Take a break at Sechseläuteplatz A lively area by the lake and home to one of the largest town squares in Switzerland.
